price: 2. And you see that the people enter Allah’s religion (Islâm) in crowds.
arabic: وَرَأَيۡتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدۡخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفۡوَاجٗا

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: wara-ayta al-nāsa yadkhulūna fī dīni al-lahi afwājan
